titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at St. Michael Crooked-Lane September the 8th. 1700 Upon occasion of the death of His Illustrious Highness the Duke of Gloucester· By James Gardiner, M.A. rector of the said parish.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, James, 1637-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Hugh Newman, at the Grashopper in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Half-title: Mr. Gardiner's Sermon on the death of the Duke of Gloucester.
Running title reads: A sermon on the death of the Duke of Gloucester.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
